attributes.action: refrain from extending the time terror suspects can be held without charge from 28 to 90 days
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current 28-day limit is already the longest period a suspect can be held without charge in the free world, to extend this limit further would be a gross violation of human rights.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
